UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Bovine hemoglobin: an attractive source of antibacterial peptides
Literature.Author: Nedjar-Arroume N, Dubois-Delval V, Adje EY, Traisnel J, Krier F, Mary P, Kouach M, Briand G, Guillochon D

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=5µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=9µM),Listeria innocua(MIC=1µM),Micrococcus luteus A270(MIC=5µM)
